newsitem.title: PHILIPPINES: Pryce to sell 500 mln pesos worth stocks.
newsitem.headline: Pryce to sell 500 mln pesos worth stocks.

text.p: Pryce Properties Corp plans to raise up to 500 million pesos from the sale of additional stocks, according to papers submitted to the Philippine Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC).
Pryce said it planned to sell 250 million shares at 1.60 to two pesos each to raise funds for the expansion of its gas unit, Pryce Gases Inc.
It has appointed UCPB Capital underwriter of the stock offering which is equivalent to 13.4 percent of its outstanding capital stock.
Pryce Gases plans to build liquefied petroleum gas filling stations in Visayas and Mindanao islands.
